Internet/Wi-Fi Access Facility
IIT Jodhpur have up to 4 Gbps Internet Leased Line from NKN, BSNL, PGCIL.
Users can access Internet with valid credentials without any proxy settings.
However, it is suggested use Mozilla Firefox browser and not to close keep Alive window for continuous internet access.

Download and configure below settings for connecting to WPA-2 Enterprise Wireless Network:
(i)Linux(ii)Windows(iii)Mac(iv)Mobile(v)Certificate
